UAAutomation Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in UAAutomation.h

Overview

Manager class for scheduling actions.

A schedule identifier.

scheduleActions:completionHandler:

Schedules actions.

- (void)scheduleActions:(UAActionScheduleInfo *)scheduleInfo completionHandler:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( UAActionSchedule *__nullable ))completionHandler

Parameters

scheduleInfo

The schedule information.

completionHandler

The completion handler when the action is scheduled. If the schedule info is invalid, the action schedule will be nil.
